tool_description: Generates properly formatted in-text citations based on the citation style and context within the document.

authors.description: List of author names for the citation

citation_style.description: Citation style: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver

page_number.description: Specific page number for direct quotes

error_messages: Empty author list: Provide at least one author name.
Invalid year format: Year must be a valid 4-digit number.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver].
Invalid citation context: Use one of [narrative, parenthetical, multiple_authors].
usage: Provide authors, year, and citation_style. Optionally specify page_number and citation_context for more precise in-text citation formatting.
